import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'my-store'; categories = ['Electronics', 'Clothing', 'Home&Garden', 'Grocery','Beauty&Health'] }
